GYMMS or, Gym Management System was conceptualized by Subhamoy Karmakar and Kanchan Basu, with two things in mind. \n1. Centralize and encapsulate the whole gym management system such that owners can have a higher degree of control over their assets through mobile/desktop application.\n2. Accountability.\n\nThe GYMMS package will not only make life much easier but also make the establishment a more secure environment for everyone.
Subhamoy Karmakar> He is the lead developer and designer, and along with Mr. Kanchan Basu came up with the concept about GYMMS. You can reach him at subhamoykarmakar225@gmail.com.
Kanchan Basu He along with Subhamoy came with the initial concept of GYMMS. You can reach him at ...
